question: Was golimumab tested for diabetes?
ideal_answer: Yes, among children and young adults with newly diagnosed overt type 1 diabetes, golimumab resulted in better endogenous insulin production and less exogenous insulin use than placebo.

snippets.text: CONCLUSIONS: Among children and young adults with newly diagnosed overt type 1 diabetes, golimumab resulted in better endogenous insulin production and less exogenous insulin use than placebo.
Golimumab and Beta-Cell Function in Youth with New-Onset Type 1 Diabetes.
